topic: How to containerize microservices using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to containerize microservices using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Containerizing Microservices Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a comprehensive guide on how to containerize microservices using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+. It covers key steps, code examples, and important notes.
key_points: Creating a simple microservice using FastAPI

code_examples.code:
FROM python:3.12
WORKDIR /app
COPY . .
RUN pip install fastapi uvicorn
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "80"]

version_notes: Python 3.12 is required for this guide
FastAPI version should be compatible with Python 3.12 (currently, FastAPI v0.75.0 supports Python 3.12)
caveats: Ensure Docker is installed and properly configured on your system
Replace the sample code with your own microservice implementation
